attributes.review: Literally the worst app to even be invented. Don’t waste your space and time on this app. It makes my phone glitch all the time and it’s mad annoying.

attributes.review: The app is no good.  I wanted to learn more about the views of trump so I could make an informed vote in December...this app didn’t help.  Probably the biggest time eater for me this week.  Do not recommend!!!!!!
attributes.title: No thanks
